plot outline: Notty (Jeet) is a Bengal police constable that desperately wants a promotion. Because of this, he accepts Superindent of Police request backed up by Inspector to fly to Italy to retrieve his daughter, Sameera (Nusrat Faria). Notty assumes that this will be an easy task and on reaching Italy starts his mission to bring Sameera back but mistakes Sameera 's friend working in a parlour as Sameera herself but is dismayed when Sameera ends up being a "by the books" officer with the Italian Police Department who has left the parlour sometime back because of the Police Job. Notty in order to bring her back and to avoid deportation back to India helps Sameera to convince her Mother in getting herself roped with a white man in marriage bond whom Sameera likes. These clashes with his irreverent and unsophisticated personality, but soon the two begin to find themselves drawn to one another. The story will be about Notty's desire to become an Inspector and the changing equations of the relationship between Notty and Sameera.
title: Inspector Notty K
plot: Notty K encounters strange events on his visit to Italy to bring back Samira to reunite her with her family .

Notty (Jeet) is a Bengal police constable that desperately wants a promotion. Because of this, he accepts Superindent of Police request backed up by Inspector to fly to Italy to retrieve his daughter, Sameera (Nusrat Faria). Notty assumes that this will be an easy task and on reaching Italy starts his mission to bring Sameera back but mistakes Sameera 's friend working in a parlour as Sameera herself but is dismayed when Sameera ends up being a "by the books" officer with the Italian Police Department who has left the parlour sometime back because of the Police Job. Notty in order to bring her back and to avoid deportation back to India helps Sameera to convince her Mother in getting herself roped with a white man in marriage bond whom Sameera likes. These clashes with his irreverent and unsophisticated personality, but soon the two begin to find themselves drawn to one another. The story will be about Notty's desire to become an Inspector and the changing equations of the relationship between Notty and Sameera.
